languages.text: "Будь мы на дознании, я бы порадовался такому ответу. А сейчас мы попросту теряем время".
"If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."
languages.original_text: "Будь мы на дознании, я бы порадовался такому ответу. А сейчас мы попросту теряем время".

traits.locale_text: "If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. Instead, we are merely wasting our time."
"If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. Instead, we are merely wasting our time."
"If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."
"If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."
"If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."
"If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."

languages.text: « S'il y avait eu une question associée à cette réponse, alors cela me conviendrait. Mais dans le cas présent, nous ne faisons que perdre notre temps. »
languages.original_text: "If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."

traits.locale_text: « S'il y avait eu une question associée à cette réponse, alors cela me conviendrait. Mais dans le cas présent, nous ne faisons que perdre notre temps. »

languages.text: «Si esto fuese un interrogatorio, esa respuesta me parecería aceptable. Pero en este caso estamos perdiendo el tiempo».
languages.original_text: "If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."

traits.locale_text: «Si esto fuese un interrogatorio, esa respuesta me parecería aceptable. Pero en este caso estamos perdiendo el tiempo».

languages.text: 「これが尋問であれば、その反応は大歓迎なんだがね。だが今の状況では、ただの時間の無駄だな」
languages.original_text: "If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."

traits.locale_text: 「これが尋問であれば、その反応は大歓迎なんだがね。だが今の状況では、ただの時間の無駄だな」

languages.text: “如果这是场审讯，我会很喜欢这样的回答，但在目前的情况下，我们只是在浪费时间而已。”
languages.original_text: "If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."

traits.locale_text: “如果这是场审讯，我会很喜欢这样的回答，但在目前的情况下，我们只是在浪费时间而已。”

languages.text: "Wäre das hier ein Verhör, würde ich so eine Reaktion begrüßen. Aber in diesem Fall vergeuden wir nur unsere Zeit."
languages.original_text: "If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre das hier ein Verhör, würde ich so eine Reaktion begrüßen. Aber in diesem Fall vergeuden wir nur unsere Zeit."

languages.text: "Bu bir sorgu olsaydı cevabını makul görebilirdim. Fakat bu durumda vaktimizi boşa harcadığımızla kalıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "If this were an interrogation, I would welcome such a response. But in this case we are merely wasting our time."
